text: Bradley Chase Walsh (born 4 June 1960) is an English actor, comedian, singer, and television presenter. People know him for his roles as Danny Baldwin in Coronation Street, DS Ronnie Brooks in Law & Order: UK, and Graham O'Brien in Doctor Who. Walsh also hosts the ITV game shows The Chase and Cash Trapped. Walsh is a former professional footballer for Brentford. == Other websites == * Official website * Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:English television actors Category:English comedians Category:English television presenters Category:English footballers Category:Actors from Hertfordshire Category:Brentford F.C. players
title: Bradley Walsh
